Static Website Generation

Uses template systems to create static website content.

Jekyll

https://jekyllrb.com/

  • Simple to use
  • Extremely solid tutorial on main site, showcases everything you need to know to 'hit the ground running'
  • Written in Ruby, which I don't know or understand or want to learn.

Hugo

main site, Hugo notes

  • Written in Go, which is my new favourite Language
  • Uses the standard template library from Go
  • Extremely poor 'getting started' documentation for learning the fundamentals. I expected something simple, basic and fun like the Jekyll user guide. However, they just say â€œinstall a theme and figure out how to use this theme. Here is technical documentation about the system for people that know what they are doing.
